qas.question: The Times features what in the first half of its newspaper?
What section begins after the first half of The Times newspaper?
What is The Times current price for the daily edition?
What feature begins on the centre spread of The Times?
What section is featured at the end of the main paper of The Times?

context: The Times features <a0_0>news<a0_0/> for the first half of the paper, the <a1_0>Opinion/Comment section<a1_0/> begins after the first news section with world news normally following this. The <a3_0>business pages<a3_0/> begin on the centre spread, and are followed by The Register, containing obituaries, Court & Social section, and related material. The <a4_0>sport section<a4_0/> is at the end of the main paper. The Times current prices are <a2_0>£1.20<a2_0/> for the daily edition and £1.50 for the Saturday edition.
